name: Parasomnia (VGDA)
description:
Parasomnia is the finished product of a semester of work by the Video Game Development Association at Cal State Long Beach. Survive the horrifying world of a child's nightmares.

UNCOVER YOUR SECRETS:

Collect sentimental items within your dream to unravel the mystery behind your recurring nightmares.

EXPLORE A TWISTED WORLD:

Navigate the maze-like mansion in your nightmares, with dark and twisted art based upon surrealist styles.

FIND YOUR PATH:

Never play the same game twice. Each level is randomly generated so you encounter a new challenge each time you play.

TEST YOUR LIMITS:

See how long you can survive the Nightmare Tower. Ascend through endless floors of horrors and try to beat your highest score.
